title: Make flashcards (recto-verso) with data from excel. 8 fashcards per A4
snippet:
Making recto - verso fashcards (english text on one side. German text on the other side).

8 flashcards / section per A4.

I have data in an excel spreadsheet.

About 1100 lines, and 7 columns.

This data needs to be organised on into different sections on A4.

A4 page is split into 8 sections.

I need to extracted data from excel, and organise it into different sections.

The process is repetitive, so a SCRIPT is necessary, or some sort of RULE.

I want to be able to to change the font size, font type. and also format how and where exactly the data is in the sections (8 sections per A4 page)


I have attached an example of how it should look like.

What is IN YELLOW COLOUR should NOT be printed. It's just for explanation / reference.

S1, S2, S3, S4... are NOT data from the speadsheet, and should NOT be added to the square. They are just references.

S1 = section 1
S2 = section 2
S3 = section 3
S4 = section 4, etc...

S7 and S8, and S15 and S16 is an example with the actual data.

Data in [ square brackets ] refers to excel cell numbers where the content comes from.


If you wish to apply, please let me know HOW to plan to solve this problem. I don't need the exact details, but tell me if: you plan to do the pagination within excel, OR if you plan to use a script, or any other method.


Thank you!
